attributes.action: Help make a change in social services in the country
attributes.additional_details: I would like the parliament to strengthen social services and look at the way they work and whether more can be done to help these children have better upbringings.
attributes.background: After going through a personal experience with social services I would like the government to help make a change with social services in this country for the children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619454
